body.name: Epson EX3280 3-Chip 3LCD XGA Projector, 3,600 Lumens Color Brightness, 3,600 Lumens White Brightness, HDMI, Built-in Speaker, 15,000:1 Contrast Ratio
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 21 mins
features: Amazing brightness — 3,600 lumens of color and white brightness (1) ideal for displaying large-group presentations, spreadsheets and videos, even in well-lit rooms
Crisp image quality — XGA resolution delivers crisp text and images; perfect for displaying presentations, video and more

True 3-Chip 3LCD technology — displays 100% of the RGB color signal for every frame, providing outstanding color accuracy while maintaining excellent color brightness, without any distracting “rainbowing” or “color brightness” issues seen with other projection technologies
Versatile connectivity — features an HDMI port, so you can easily connect streaming devices, including Fire TV, Apple TV, Roku and Chromecast (2)
Easy setup — built-in speaker for easy setup for video and audio right out of the box
Built-in picture skew sensor — automatically analyzes the picture and instantly corrects the vertical keystone to help square the image
Amazing dynamic contrast ratio up to 15,000:1 — provides crisp, rich detail for graphs, images and videos
Award-winning service and support — standard 1-year limited warranty, full-unit replacement, along with free technical phone support for the life of the product
body.description: Impress your audience and own the room with the ultra bright EX3280 projector, offering 3,600 lumens of color and white brightness (1) to deliver crisp, detailed presentations, spreadsheets and videos – even in well-lit spaces. From home offices to large video conference rooms, this sleek, compact projector makes it easy to display captivating, big-screen images in nearly any location, using advanced 3-chip 3LCD technology and crisp XGA resolution. Perfect for creating dynamic, engaging presentations, the EX3280 allows for easy Zoom video conferencing and conveniently connects to streaming devices, such as Fire TV, Apple TV, Roku, and Chromecast, through the HDMI port so you can easily share a variety of rich content, including movies, TV shows and more (2). 1. Color brightness (color light output) and white brightness (white light output) will vary depending on usage conditions. Color light output measured in accordance with IDMS 15.4; white light output measured in accordance with ISO 21118. 2. Requires wireless network connection of 5 Mbps or faster. Some apps require paid subscriptions. 3. SmartWay is an innovative partnership of the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency that reduces greenhouse gases and other air pollutants and improves fuel efficiency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great projector for our small to medium conference room. It was easy to set-up and the picture is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE it
reviews.reviewText: Excellent, bright picture easily controlled with the very comprehensive remote. The feature which puts this projector over the top for me is the excellend sound quality and volume. Videos can be clearly heard in a large room by thirty people, with volume to spare. Perfect for my use. I LOVE it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tl;dr- Excellent price range for normal user, but not 4k or HD audio
reviews.reviewText: Great product for the value. Bought this product as an alternative to a conventional tv. Love the fact that it does the same job as a 70"+ tv for a fraction of the cost, especially with the fact it is a renewed/refurb product. It saves space from needing the actual tv and a stand, where instead it can sit easily sit on top of a bookshelf.However, it does have its caveats. The quality isn't going to be HD/4K res, as shown in my photos. So if you are an intense gamer or one of the sports fanatics who needs res to the extent of seeing every wrinkle on the player, this might not be for you.Additionally, sound quality directly from projector is reasonable for most scenarios. The one problem would be it can't handle having the audio is ALL the way up especially during a bass-heavy moment. You can probably get an HDMI audio extractor to hook it up to proper speakers, but I haven't found the need to yet.All in all, worth the purchase for my needs, would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: HASTA AHORA MUY EFICIENTE Y TRABAJA EXCELENTE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought this after trying a smaller, less expensive projector. The church is well lit on Sunday morning, so I needed a bright picture, and this projector delivers in spades. I was even able to adjust the picture so that those on the far side of the building can see it more straight on. I highly recommend this product if you are looking for quality without a huge price tag. The only thing I wish it had that the smaller projector had is a thumb drive port and blue tooth capability. Otherwise, great product at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lacks sufficient resolution
reviews.reviewText: Projector display resolution is not suitable for text at the average 10 foot distance. Dialed up the "sharpness" to max on the remote, but does little good.Pictures fairly bright, HDMI coupling works well. Focus is a little imprecise. My presentations demand a better Epson product, but unfortunately the cost of those is too high.Suitable for average home use but not for educational programs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easily setup. Great picture quality.
reviews.reviewText: Easily setup and navigated once turned on. Great for projecting movies and slide shows onto a wall or screen. Makes upscaling my artwork for large murals/installations so much simpler, cutting my time significantly so that I can focus on other tasks.

The projector is great but .... the word "Renewed" is deceiving as it actual refers to a refurbished projector not a new one. I took the word "Renewed" as referring to the ad being reposted. The projector was advertise as $519.00 but I was charged $549.00. The delivery was late.
Práctico y ligero buena calidad de imagen

Great quality. Easy to hook up fire stick and watch in 5 minutes.Excellent picture and we are very happy with the quality of picture.Sound is ok. A bluetooth speaker is very helpful and a must for better sound.

Es la primera vez que compro un producto re manufacturado. Llevamos usándolo 1 año y ha sido una excelente compra, sobre todo por que es un proyector de excelentes características técnicas y lo adquirimos por casi la mitad de su precio.
El equipo salió perfecto. Buena relación precio
